title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9700.3 - Contractor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9700.3 - Contractor

State Regulations

For the contractor, these regulations govern the
following: (a) notices to be sent to
applicants and participants under the program; (b) information and documents to be provided
to applicants/participants, or their representatives, who have requested a fair
hearing; (c) the fair hearing
process; and
(d) compliance with
fair hearing decisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9700.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
